skill.s1.name: Butterfly Beheadment
skill.s1.description: Deal [color=#fe0037][b]Curse damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] of [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color], and inflict 2 [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] stacks on the target.
When the target is above [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] current [color=#fe0037][b]HP[/b][/color], heavily increase [color=#fe0037][b]skill damage[/b][/color].
If this skill kills the target, activate this skill again (can chain activation).
[color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color]: Take [color=#fe0037][b]Curse damage[/b][/color] equal to Ichigo's [color=#fe0037][b]Y% ATK[/b][/color] for 4 turns, up to X stacks.
When the foe with [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] dies, transfer its [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] to the highest [color=#fe0037][b]HP[/b][/color] foe.
skill.s2.name: Blood Rose's Kiss
skill.s2.description: Deal [color=#fe0037][b]Curse damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] of [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color], and inflict 4 [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] stacks on the target.
skill.s3.name: Hush! It's Execution Time
skill.s3.description: Deal [color=#fe0037][b]Curse damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] of [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color] + [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] stacks x [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] of [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color], when [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] stacks reach Y, deal [color=#fe0037][b]Curse damage[/b][/color] to 1 foes equal to [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] of [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color] more.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deal [color=#fe0037][b]Curse damage[/b][/color] to 1 foe equal to [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] of [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color], and make [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] can deal [color=#fe0037][b]CRITICAL[/b][/color] for Y turns.
Immediately deal all [color=#fe0037][b]Damage Over Time damage[/b][/color] on the target.
skill.p1.name: Obsession
skill.p1.description: Increase [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fe0037][b]Y%[/b][/color] for each [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] stack.
skill.p2.name: Attachment
skill.p2.description: When Ichigo is on the field, increase party's [color=#fe0037][b]Damage Over Time Effect[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: If I Take the Poison of Love
awareness.a0.description: When Ichigo uses [ref=s1][color=#374e85][b][u][Butterfly Beheadment][/u][/b][/color][/ref] for the first time, gain 1 [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] stack.
When using [ref=hl][color=#374e85][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref], gain 1 [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] stack, up to 3 stacks.
Gain the following boost effects based on [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] stacks:
1 stack: For every [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] stack on foes, increase their [color=#fe0037][b]DMG Taken[/b][/color].
2 stacks: Increase [color=#fe0037][b]Crit Rate[/b][/color], Ichigo's Persona skill damage counts as [color=#fe0037][b]Damage Over Time[/b][/color].
awareness.a1.name: If I'm Broken
awareness.a1.description: When using a Persona skill, inflict 1 [color=#a93250][b][Resentment][/b][/color] stack on the target more.
awareness.a2.name: If I Allow Delusions to Run Rampant
awareness.a2.description: At the start of battle, gain 1 [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] stack.
Gain the following boost effect based on [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] stacks:

5 stacks: When Ichigo takes fatal damage, enter near death and gain 4 [color=#7670a6][b][Crazed Delusion][/b][/color] stacks, cannot drop below [color=#fe0037][b]1 HP[/b][/color] when in near death, spend 1 [color=#7670a6][b][Crazed Delusion][/b][/color] after each ally's action, faint after spending all [color=#7670a6][b][Crazed Delusion][/b][/color] stacks.
awareness.a3.name: If Begging for Mercy Works
awareness.a3.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s3][color=#374e85][b][u][Hush! It's Execution Time][/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=hl][color=#374e85][b][u][Theif Tactics][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a4.name: If Love Keeps Accumulating
awareness.a4.description: After using [ref=hl][color=#374e85][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref], permanently increase [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color], up to [color=#fe0037][b]Y[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: If Danger Draws Near
awareness.a5.description: Increase the skill levels of [ref=s1][color=#374e85][b][u][Butterfly Beheadment][/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=s2][color=#374e85][b][u][Blood Rose's Kiss][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 3.
awareness.a6.name: If You Discovered My Other Self
awareness.a6.description: When [color=#e7186f][b][Obsessive Love][/b][/color] reaches a certain stack, gain the following effects:

1 stack: After using [ref=s1][color=#374e85][b][u][Butterfly Beheadment][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally use [ref=s1][color=#374e85][b][u][Butterfly Beheadment][/u][/b][/color][/ref] on the target (once per battle).

2 stacks: After using [ref=s2][color=#374e85][b][u][Blood Rose's Kiss][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally use [ref=s2][color=#374e85][b][u][Blood Rose's Kiss][/u][/b][/color][/ref] on the target (once per battle).

3 stacks: After using [ref=s3][color=#374e85][b][u][Hush! It's Execution Time][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally use [ref=s3][color=#374e85][b][u][Hush! It's Execution Time][/u][/b][/color][/ref] on the target (once per battle).

4 stacks: Ichigo can use [ref=hl][color=#374e85][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] on her turn once (once per battle, do not spend [color=#fe0037][b]HIGHLIGHT Energy[/b][/color] and affect [color=#fe0037][b]HIGHLIGHT cooldown[/b][/color]).
